Text: Poems, Chiefly in the Scottish Dialect commonly known as the Kilmarnock volume or Kilmarnock edition, is a collection of poetry by Robert Burns, first printed and issued by John Wilson of Kilmarnock on 31 July 1786.

1:

Text: Kilmarnock volume:  It was the first published edition of Burns' work.

<Text: Kilmarnock volume:  It cost 3 shillings and 612 copies were printed.>
